A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Not a robot\, just a disappointed fan that created this account to say this movie was as bad as the true fans say.

I grew up watching and loving these characters.  I saw the battles between good and evil and between hope and despair.  I take my Star Wars very seriously and I cannot understand how this movie was even made.

We saw the pitiful treatment of our old heroes.  We saw the introduction of some new (and boring/annoying) new characters.  We saw a movie go absolutely no where.  It was really that bad.
